sentence: Ohio Governor Mike DeWine announced Wednesday that more than $2.5 million in grants was given to agencies to support victims of family violence, domestic violence and dating violence during the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a release.
author: Schalischa Petit-De
title: 3 Miami Valley agencies receive grants to support family violence victims

sentence: DAYTON, Ohio (WDTN) – Governor Mike DeWine signed House Bill 4 into law Monday, which added a layer of security for Ohio’s children.
author: Caroline Morse
title: House bill prompted after Takoda Collins’ death signed into law

sentence: DAYTON, Ohio (WDTN) – In a letter to Governor Mike DeWine on Thursday, Secretary of State Frank LaRose expressed his concerns about the upcoming primary election.
author: Riley Phillips
title: Montgomery Co. election officials discuss May primary after redistricting maps struck down
